title: Ineos Stunner: Tom Pidcock is ‘Deselected’ for Lombardia
content:
Pidcock sparks fresh intrigue and speculation after being told Thursday night he would be left out of Ineos Grenadiers' lineup for the season-ending Italian monument: 'I guess off-season starts early.'

Read the full article at Ineos Stunner: Tom Pidcock is ‘Deselected’ for Lombardia on Velo.
author: ahood
